name: Apple Noodle Kugel
author: SCENT4U
summary: This is easy to make and can be used as a side dish or a dessert.  It's great reheated, too.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook egg noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 5 minutes
Stir melted butter and noodles in a large bowl
Mix apples, egg yolks, sugar, raisins, cinnamon, and vanilla extract into noodle mixture until well blended
Beat egg whites in a large bowl until stiff peaks form
Lift your beater or whisk straight up: the egg whites should form a sharp peak that holds its shape
Fold egg whites into noodle mixture; pour into prepared baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until browned, about 40 minutes
